subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Carey Price made 26 saves, Tomas Plekanec and Andrei Kostitsyn scored, and the Montreal Canadiens beat the host Los Angeles Kings, 2-1, ending a four-game losing streak.
snippet: Carey Price made 26 saves, Tomas Plekanec and Andrei Kostitsyn scored, and the Montreal Canadiens beat the host Los Angeles Kings, 2-1, ending a four-game losing streak.
